summary: Two inseparable, hormonal, English BFF teen boys, avoided by all others, head to Ibiza with Kevin's parents. Will they lose their virginity there?
cast: Harry Enfield|Kathy Burke|Rhys Ifans|Laura Fraser|James Fleet|Louisa Rix|Tabitha Wady|Paul Whitehouse|Natasha Little|Anna Shillinglaw|Badi Uzzaman|Sam Parks|Kenneth Cranham|Mark Tonderai|Patsy Byrne|Amelia Curtis|Christopher Ettridge|Frank Harper|Rupert Vansittart|Steven O'Donnell|Shugs|James Dark|James Murray|Steve McFadden|Jo Burton|Kerry Burton|Ed Bye|Donna Ewin|Joe Gunn|Lynne Hazelden|Iain Hoskins|Elliot Joseph|José Antonio Romero|Owen Schumacher|Christian Simpson|Kate G. Smith
title: Kevin & Perry: ¡Hoy mojamos!
